headline: Desktop Support Analyst and Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience providing technical support, troubleshooting systems, and maintaining reliable IT environments. Skilled in supporting Windows systems, cloud platforms, databases, and enterprise applications. Experienced in resolving Level 1 & 2 incidents, supporting deployments, and assisting users onsite and remotely. Oracle SQL Certified, strong communicator, quick learner, and committed to delivering reliable IT support.
